Meeting Agendas & Minutes
=========================

Texas law requires official meetings to be posted at least 72 hours prior to the meeting date and time. On this page, you will find meeting information and agendas for the Airport Development Plan Committee, the Rockdale City Council, the Rockdale Municipal Development District, and advisory boards. For information on Citizen Participation in City Council Meetings, view the [Citizen Participation Booklet (PDF)](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/2206 "Citizen Participation") and the [Citizen Communication Guidelines (PDF)](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/4465/Citizen-Communication-Guidelines-PDF).

*Note: To see copies of agendas or minutes no longer listed on this page, go to E-Services, then Archive Center. Click*[*HERE*](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/Archive.aspx)

***ALL MEETING AGENDA'S AND MINUTES AFTER JULY 22, 2024 CAN BE FOUND IN THE AGENDA CENTER. <https://www.rockdaletx.gov/agendacenter>***
=======================================================================================================================================
